===Phrase===
{{zh-phrase}}

# {{lb|zh|slang|mildly|rude}} [[my ass]], [[my arse]]
#: {{zh-x|「你 就 好 啦，乜嘢嘢 都 有 人 幫 你 安排 好！」「好 '''你個頭'''！ 乜嘢 都 係 我 自己 搞掂{dim6} 㗎！」|"There's always someone to help you get things done; you've [[have it good|got it so good]]!" "Good '''my ass'''! Everything was done by me!"|C-GZ}}
#: {{zh-x|「^我 剛剛 去 了……」「^去 了 '''你個頭'''！」|"I just went to..." "Went '''my ass'''!"}}

====Usage notes====
Appended to the first word of any expression, without regarding whether it is a verb.
